item.title: Taeyoon Kim
item.dc:creator: Taeyoon Kim
item.description:
Summary¶

A full-stack biologist who is skilled in handling protein purification and computer languages which qualified to Bioinformatics analysis. I enjoy being part of, as well as managing, motivating, learning and developing. A successful and productive team and I thrive in highly pressurised and challenging working environments.

  • Personal Hompage:
    • http://partrita.iptime.org
    • http://partrita.github.io
    • https://tomorrow-lab.github.io
  • Github: https://github.com/partrita

Work Experience¶

Scientist, HANALL biopharma 2022-PRESENT¶

Suwon-si, South Korea, http://en.hanall.co.kr/

  • scRNA-seq data analysis
  • in silico drug discovery

Leader, Panolos biosicence 2020-2022¶

Hwaseong-si, South Korea, http://www.panolos.com/

  • in silico protein designer
  • Purification process developer

Researcher, CKDpharm2019-2020¶

Yongin-si, South Korea, http://www.ckdpharm.com/

  • Protein engineering
  • POC study(HPLC analysis, PK)
  • Purification process developer

Researcher, Mogam Institute, Greencross2015-2019¶

Yongin-si, South Korea, http://www.mogam.re.kr/

  • Protein engineering
  • POC study (HPLC analysis, PK, PD)
  • Conjugated protein (ADC, PEGylation)

Internship, Korea Basic Science Institute2015-2015¶

Cheongju-si, South Korea, https://www.kbsi.re.kr/

  • High-throughput Mass spectrometry data analysis
  • Charts and report design for a small medical device company

Internship, SK Bioland cop.2011-2011¶

Cheongju-si, South Korea, http://www.skbioland.com/

Support research and development group for diagnosis of HIV

  • Testing HIV detection kits

Education¶

Master of Science, Structural biology2013-2015 ¶

POSTECH, Pohang

Bachelor of Science, Microbiology2006-2013¶

Chungbuk National Univ, Cheongju

Achivements¶

  • (번역)생명과학을 위한 딥러닝, 에이콘출판, 2020
  • (번역)파이썬을 활용한 생명정보학 2/e, 에이콘출판, 2019, 원제: Bioinformatics with Python Cookbook - Second Edition
  • (특허)알부민 및 리소좀 효소를 포함하는 단백질 접합체 및 융합단백질, WO2019124973, 2019
  • (특허)체내 지속형 재조합 당단백질 및 이의 제조방법, 출원번호: 1020180004589, 2018
  • (특허)PVR 및 4-1BBL을 포함하는 융합단백질 및 이의 용도, 출원번호:1020170054798, 2017
  • ATP‐dependent DNA binding, unwinding, and resection by the Mre11/Rad50 complex, EMBO, 2015
  • Natronomonas Gomsonensis Sp. Nov., Isolated from a Solar Saltern, Antonie van Leeuwenhoek, 2013
